title: Badger Chat Website
description: A Full-Stack React Web App with real-time chat, API integration, and responsive design. Implemented user authentication, dynamic navigation, and post management for enhanced interactivity.

title: DNA Transcription
description: An application that can convert a string of DNA to mRNA to an amino acid implemented as a linked queue data structure

title: Space Invader
description: A fully functional Space Invader application using pygame
